title: Appeal Request Reasons
description: Enumeration and descriptions of valid appeal request reasons

typicalTimeframeBusinessDays.description: Typical timeframe for resolution in business days

DENIED_CLAIM.description: Claim was denied and provider is appealing the denial decision

PARTIAL_PAYMENT.description: Claim was partially paid and provider believes full payment is warranted

CODING_DISPUTE.description: Disagreement with procedure or diagnosis codes used by payer

MEDICAL_NECESSITY.description: Service was denied as not medically necessary; provider appeals with clinical justification

TIMELY_FILING.description: Claim denied for late submission; provider provides justification for delay

AUTHORIZATION_ISSUE.description: Claim denied due to missing or invalid authorization; provider provides documentation

OUT_OF_NETWORK.description: Claim denied as out-of-network; provider appeals for in-network consideration

COORDINATION_OF_BENEFITS.description: Dispute regarding coordination of benefits with other insurance

DUPLICATE_CLAIM.description: Claim denied as duplicate; provider provides evidence it is unique

OTHER.description: Other appeal reason not covered by standard categories
